title: Mixtape: Hawk House – A Little More Elbow Room
body:
As most are listening to **Chance The Rapper**’s new Mixtape or willing those snippets of new **Kanye West** tracks to be more than just poorly recorded bit of noise, I’ve been wrapping my ears around _A Little More Elbow Room,_ the debut mixtape from Hip Hop/RnB three piece **Hawk House.**

The London based trio have been making waves recently but it’s this mixtape that’s sure to cement them as a firm, ‘one to watch’.

The beats are smooth as hell, (although most a lifted), the flows confident and socially consciousness, while never being preachy, and the whole thing has an attractively assured laid back energy that’s simply a delight to sink yourself into.

Don’t even get me started on these kids chemistry; they MUST have known each other for a _very_ long time. This shit comes naturally to them.

  
[Download Mixtape](http://www.datpiff.com/Hawk-House-A-Little-More-Elbow-Room-mixtape.484799.html) | [Free Mixtapes](http://www.datpiff.com) Powered by [DatPiff.com](http://www.datpiff.com/ "Free Mixtapes")
